help-file.title: "ESSENCE OF THE WOLF"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Animal
To call upon the "Essence Of The Wolf", the Animalist must enter into a trancelike state and bestow all of his power upon one person. Once the chant is complete, the beneficiary of the Wolven Spirit will swell with tremendous physical power. The Animalist must continue the chant uninterrupted for the spiritual flow to remain constant. If anything causes the chant to cease, the Essence Of The Wolf will depart.
